appDesc.message: TabBoost is a Chrome extension that helps you manage your tabs more efficiently.

duplicateTab.description: Action to duplicate the current tab

copyUrl.description: Action to copy the current URL

refreshPreview.description: Button text to reload the link preview iframe

toggleSplitView.description: Action to toggle split view mode

popupSizePreset.description: Label for popup size preset dropdown

cannotLoadInPopup.message: Cannot load this website in popup.
cannotLoadInPopup.description: Message when site cannot be loaded in popup

openInNewTab.description: Button to open in new tab

adjustPopupSize.message: Adjust popup size for optimal browsing experience

previewDescription.message: Gray area represents clickable empty space

iframeCompatibility.description: Title for iframe compatibility settings tab

closeLeftView.description: Button to close left view in split view

closeRightView.description: Button to close right view in split view

cannotLoadInSplitView.message: Cannot load this content in split view
cannotLoadInSplitView.description: Error message when content cannot be loaded in split view

websiteNotAllowed.message: This website may not allow embedding in an iframe
websiteNotAllowed.description: Message explaining why content cannot be loaded in split view

splitViewFailure.message: Split view loading failed, opening in new tab...
splitViewFailure.description: Notification when split view fails to load

splitViewSettings.description: Title for split view settings section

configureSplitView.message: Configure split view behavior and appearance

splitViewUsage.description: Title for split view usage instructions

splitViewInstructions.message: In split view mode, hold Command+Shift and click links to open them on the right side

configureExtensionBehavior.description: Description for the general settings section

viewModeSettings.description: Title for view mode settings tab

splitViewDescription.message: Configure behavior and appearance of split view mode

splitViewUsageInstructions.description: Title for split view usage instructions

splitViewUsageDetail.message: In split view mode, hold Command+Shift and click a link to open it on the right side
splitViewUsageDetail.description: Instructions for using split view mode

iframeCompatibilityDescription.message: Configure how websites are loaded in popups and split view

extensionFooter.message: TabBoost - Make your browsing experience more efficient

popupSizeHint.message: Popup size can be adjusted in extension options
popupSizeHint.description: Hint that popup size can be adjusted in options

settingsSaved.description: Message shown when settings are saved

settingsSaveFailed.description: Message shown when settings failed to save

waitingRefreshWebsite.description: Message shown when waiting for webpage to refresh

savePageConfirmation.description: Confirmation message when user tries to save a page

continueToSave.description: Button text to proceed with saving the page

savePageInstructionMac.message: You can save this page via File → Save Page As... or press Command+S again within 3 seconds
savePageInstructionMac.description: Instructions for Mac users on how to save the page after clicking continue

savePageInstructionOther.message: You can save this page by selecting File → Save Page As... or press Ctrl+S again within 3 seconds
savePageInstructionOther.description: Instructions for saving a page (non-Mac platforms)

closeLeftViewTitle.message: Close left content and keep right
closeLeftViewTitle.description: Title for close left view button in split view

closeRightViewTitle.description: Title for close right view button in split view

failedToInitSplitView.message: Failed to initialize split view, please refresh the page
failedToInitSplitView.description: Error message when split view initialization fails

failedToRestoreOriginal.message: Failed to restore original page, please refresh the browser
failedToRestoreOriginal.description: Error message when restoring original page fails

cannotFindOriginalContent.message: Cannot find original page content, please refresh the browser
cannotFindOriginalContent.description: Error message when original page content cannot be found

refreshPage.description: Button text to refresh the page

contentTooLarge.message: Content is too large, cannot be saved for restoration.
contentTooLarge.description: Message shown in restored content when original page was too large to save.

restoreError.description: Error message when restoring tab content fails

splitViewErrorIframeEvent.description: Error reason when the iframe emits a generic error event

splitViewErrorCannotAccessContent.description: Error reason when script cannot access the content of the iframe (likely cross-origin)

splitViewErrorRefusedConnect.description: Error reason when the website in the iframe explicitly refuses the connection

splitViewErrorFailedSetSource.description: Error reason when setting the iframe src attribute fails

splitViewErrorLoadTimeout.description: Error reason when the iframe content fails to load within the timeout period

splitViewErrorDetectedRefused.description: Error reason when connection refusal is detected by inspecting iframe content

searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input in the popup

urlValidationErrorEmpty.message: URL is empty or incorrect format
urlValidationErrorEmpty.description: Validation error reason when the URL is empty or not a string

urlValidationErrorDecoding.message: URL decoding failed, format is incorrect
urlValidationErrorDecoding.description: Validation error reason when URL decoding fails

urlValidationErrorDangerousPattern.message: URL contains dangerous patterns, possibly XSS attacks
urlValidationErrorDangerousPattern.description: Validation error reason when the URL matches a dangerous pattern

urlValidationErrorNormalization.message: Failed to normalize URL, possibly malicious URL
urlValidationErrorNormalization.description: Validation error reason when URL normalization fails

urlValidationErrorInvalidFormat.description: Validation error reason when the URL format is invalid (e.g., cannot be parsed by new URL())

urlValidationErrorUnsupportedProtocol.description: Validation error reason when the URL protocol is not http or https

urlValidationErrorDangerousProtocol.description: Validation error reason when the URL protocol is explicitly blacklisted

urlValidationErrorDangerousPath.description: Validation error reason when the URL path/query/hash matches a dangerous pattern

urlValidationErrorGeneric.description: Generic validation error reason for unexpected errors

storageInitError.description: Error message logged when storage cache fails to initialize

urlCopyError.description: Error message logged when copying URL to clipboard fails

urlValidationFailed.description: Error message logged when URL validation fails in background script

openedInNewTabSecurity.message: Opened in new tab due to security validation: $REASON$
openedInNewTabSecurity.description: Status message when a URL is opened in a new tab because it failed security validation

getCurrentTabError.description: Error message logged when fetching the current tab fails

rightSplitViewUpdated.description: Status message indicating the right pane of the split view was updated

splitViewCreatedAndUpdated.description: Status message indicating a new split view was created and its right pane updated

splitViewRequestError.description: Error message logged for general errors during split view request handling

splitViewCreationFailed.message: Split view creation failed, opening in new tab.
splitViewCreationFailed.description: Status message indicating split view creation failed and fallback to new tab occurred

splitViewRecoveryError.description: Error message logged when closing/cleaning up split view fails after another error

recoveryFailed.message: Recovery failed, opening in new tab.
recoveryFailed.description: Status message indicating recovery after an error failed, fallback to new tab occurred

splitViewDisabledLog.message: Split view is disabled via action click due to settings.
splitViewDisabledLog.description: Log message when user tries to toggle split view but it's disabled in settings

splitViewErrorFallback.message: Split view mode error, opened in new tab
splitViewErrorFallback.description: Fallback message sent to content script when opening in split view fails catastrophically

splitViewClosedStatus.description: Status message sent to content script when split view is successfully closed

openedInNewTabStatus.description: Status message sent to content script when a URL is successfully opened in a new tab via message

optionsPageTitle.description: The title of the options page

responseHeaderModification.description: Title for response header modification settings

responseHeaderModificationDescription.message: Modify website response headers to bypass Content Security Policy (CSP) and iframe restrictions, allowing link preview functionality to work properly.
responseHeaderModificationDescription.description: Description for response header modification settings

headerModificationEnabled.message: Enable response header modification (for CSP & iframe compatibility)
headerModificationEnabled.description: Checkbox label for header modification enabled

headerModificationEnabledDescription.message: This feature is enabled by default and allows the extension to modify X-Frame-Options and Content-Security-Policy headers to allow pages to load normally in iframes.
headerModificationEnabledDescription.description: Description for header modification enabled setting

headerModificationWarning.message: Note: Disabling this feature may cause link previews for some websites to fail, as these sites may prohibit being displayed in iframes. If you encounter previews that won't load, enable this option.

notificationsEnabled.description: Label for the notifications enabled checkbox in settings

notificationsEnabledDescription.message: When enabled, system notifications will be shown for actions like URL copying
notificationsEnabledDescription.description: Description text for the notifications enabled setting

muteCurrentTab.description: Action to toggle mute state of current tab

muteAllAudioTabs.description: Action to toggle mute state of all tabs playing audio

muteTab.description: Button text to mute a tab

unmuteTab.description: Button text to unmute a tab

allTabsMuted.description: Notification when all audio tabs are muted

allTabsUnmuted.description: Notification when all audio tabs are unmuted

noAudioTabs.description: Message when no tabs playing audio are found

popupShortcutSettings.description: Title for popup shortcut settings section

popupShortcutDescription.message: Choose the shortcut combination for popup preview.

popupShortcutHint.message: You need to refresh the page for the new shortcut to take effect.

splitViewEqualRatio.description: Label for equal ratio split view option

splitViewLeftLarger.description: Label for left/top larger split view option

splitViewRightLarger.description: Label for right/bottom larger split view option

splitViewHorizontal.description: Label for horizontal split view layout

splitViewVertical.description: Label for vertical split view layout

splitViewUpdatedStatus.description: Shown when split-view preferences are saved successfully

pageLoaded.description: Shown in the preview header once the iframe content has finished loading.

loadingIssues.description: Headline shown when iframe content cannot be loaded.

bypassingFrameRestrictions.message: We're trying to bypass frame restrictions.
bypassingFrameRestrictions.description: Body copy for iframe error message explaining the workaround.

retryLoading.description: Button text to retry iframe loading.
